32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Ibn Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) allowed two shares from the spoils to the horseman and one share to the footman

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفِيَّةِ قِسْمَةِ الْغَنِيمَةِ بَيْنَ الْحَاضِرِينَ
chapter.eng-name: How booty is to be shared among the fighters
